header: What will be the school timings ?
How and when do I apply for admission ??
body: All doors to the building are locked during school hours. Students dropped off before 8:45 a.m. can enter through the main entrance. If your child is going to be arriving late, they will need to contact the office by pressing the button on the wall by the main entrance to gain entry.
